quote: She haunts my dreams.Shadows of the past.Ripping my heart down the seams.No one to blame but me.I'm a lone wolf now, but I still stare up at the moon, Call her name and wonder if she's looking too...
quote_letters: SHE HAUNTS MY DREAMSSHADOWS OF THE PASTRIPPING MY HEART DOWN THE SEAMSNO ONE TO BLAME BUT MEIM A LONE WOLF NOW BUT I STILL STARE UP AT THE MOON CALL HER NAME AND WONDER IF SHES LOOKING TOO
